definition: to moisten/to grease/to apply (cream, ointment)/to dip a brush in ink

sentences.english: Stay out of the sun, or use sunscreen and UV-blocking lip balm.
sentences.chinese: 避免接触阳光或者涂防晒霜，或者防紫外线润唇膏。

sentences.english: This is the best lip balm I have ever used.
sentences.chinese: 这是最好的润唇膏我用过。

sentences.english: Lips dry tell me, I kiss you, do not always let lip balm for your cheap.
sentences.chinese: 嘴唇干了告诉我，我吻你，别总让润唇膏占你便宜。

sentences.english: This is the VERY best lip balm I have ever used in my life.
sentences.chinese: 这是最好的润唇膏我从未在我的生活中使用。

sentences.english: The correct method is to prepare and carry quality lip gloss , use it at any time.
sentences.chinese: 正确的做法是随身备有优质的润唇膏，随时使用。

sentences.english: Love the taste - Tangerine is just Yummy!
sentences.chinese: 我真的很喜欢这个润唇膏。

sentences.english: Good lip balm, keeps lips hydrated, and has a pleasant taste and smell.
sentences.chinese: 好润唇膏，保持嘴唇水分，并有愉快的味觉和嗅觉。

sentences.english: The best lip protector I've tried and at a terrific price.
sentences.chinese: 最好的润唇膏我尝试和极好的价格。

sentences.english: Check out "these" recipes and tell you how to make your own lip balm flavors.
sentences.chinese: 看看这些食谱，告诉你如何使自己的口味的润唇膏。
